name: @sibyllinesoft/arbiter-cli
description: CUE-based specification validation and management CLI with agent-first automation
author: Nathan Rice

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && bun build src/cli.ts --outfile dist/cli.js --target=node --format=esm --bundle --external commander --external chalk --external fs-extra --external yaml --external zod --external glob --external chokidar --external diff --external uuid --external inquirer --external cli-spinners --external cli-table3 --external ora --external cuelang-js && rm -rf dist/templates && cp -R templates dist/templates
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build && npm test
